description:
Reentrancy in MarketPlace.purchaseItem(address,uint256) (contracts/MarketPlace.sol#103-152):
	External calls:
	- IERC1155(nftAddress).safeTransferFrom(address(this),msg.sender,tokenId,1,0x00) (contracts/MarketPlace.sol#123-129)
	- IERC1155(nftAddress).setApprovalForAll(msg.sender,true) (contracts/MarketPlace.sol#131)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- itemsMapping[itemId].ownerAddress = address(msg.sender) (contracts/MarketPlace.sol#133)
	- itemsMapping[itemId].isListed = false (contracts/MarketPlace.sol#135)
